messages.subject: I found this super online International Children's Library
messages.msgSnippet: I have The Green Guide (http://www.thegreenguide.com/) set up as my home page when I get online, which I forgot to include in my earlier green links ....but
messages.messageBody:
I have "The Green Guide" (http://www.thegreenguide.com/) set up as my
home page when I get online, which I forgot to include in my earlier
"green links"....but anyway, they have some great tips on holiday
shopping and one thing I came across that I have to pass on is a link to
this...the online International Children's Library...it's super! You
may need a few plug-ins but the interface is great.

http://www.childrenslibrary.org/
Here is their mission statement:


Mission statement

The mission of the International Children's Digital Library Foundation
(ICDL Foundation) is to support the world's children in becoming
effective members of the global community - who exhibit tolerance and
respect for diverse cultures, languages and ideas -- by making the best
in children's literature available online free of charge. The Foundation
pursues its vision by building a digital library of outstanding
children's books from around the world and supporting communities of
children and adults in exploring and using this literature through
innovative technology designed in close partnership with children for
children.

Amy in WV (a lover of libraries, in person and online!)
